name: Affordable Polished Concrete
overview: Affordable Polished Concrete is an Auckland based company specialising in all aspects of concrete flooring for residential, commercial or industrial use. They have an experienced team of technicians that will take care of your flooring requirements. Their services range from the initial concrete preparation stages, through polishing to final protective coatings and sealers. Their team is fully experienced in all coatings and sealers including epoxy coatings. They pride themselves in using the latest technology in diamond grinding and polishing techniques to offer cost effective, low maintenance and sustainable concrete flooring solutions.
